name: dicy
description: A fast-paced, neon-styled dice strategy game. Inspired by the tactical depth of DiceWars and Kdice, Diception delivers quick turns and intense territory conquest.

scripts.tauri:build:mac: tauri build --bundles app && rm -rf dist-steam && mkdir -p dist-steam && cp -r src-tauri/target/release/bundle/macos/*.app dist-steam/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp steam/game_actions_X.vdf dist-steam/DICEPTION.app/Contents/MacOS/game_actions_X.vdf
scripts.tauri:build:win: tauri build --bundles nsis && rm -rf dist-steam && mkdir dist-steam && cp src-tauri/target/release/diception.exe dist-steam/ && cp src-tauri/target/release/resources/steam_api64.dll dist-steam/ && cp steam/game_actions_X.vdf dist-steam/game_actions_X.vdf
